title: eloniav2

content: T/CThey help me out with it. Thank you!

comments.author: M1cha3lM
comments.body: Quote from: eloniav2 on January 15, 2023, 02:25:41 PMWhat happened:It lets you know that a good team is playing against a very poor team and give you a nice bet quote. Giving wrong team logo & names.They offered the possibility to bet on a non-existent match: CS Mioveni - CS Universitatea Craiova.Now, have a look at the name & logo of CS Universitatea Craiova: The real match of the team they make it look like: https://www.flashscore.de/spiel/jB4RhGfq/#/spiel-zusammenfassung/spiel-zusammenfassung (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oeW7Ajkqlos)The bet instead was on another team that name is: FC Universitatea 1948 (a second league team), with even different name & logo: https://www.facebook.com/fcucraiovaofficial/Giving people kinda a good quote on Barcelona - Ossasuna, and then you discover that Barcelona is Avency or any other team just by mistake. So stay aware before using they're sports bets area, the support is not useful at all they're just not assuming their own mistakes , be aware of this thieves!Scammers Profile Link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3067300Just did some searching, CS Mioveni - CS Universitatea Craiova took place in a Club Friendly Game on the date that is the same as your betslip:https://www.sofascore.com/ro/cs-mioveni-universitatea-craiova/GedsyzW which was a result of 1-1 [as shown on your betslip] meaning your bet lost. The bet you are saying was the bet you wanted to bet on ALSO took place on the 14th January, however as your betslip you didn't bet on that game [even if you intended to] you lost the bet. Image shows the 2 games that took place on the same day.Your bet would have lost anyway even if you bet on the game you claim you believed it was.

Giving wrong team logo & names.https://i.ibb.co/bFkqjdb/Immagine-2023-01-15-150906.pngThey offered the possibility to bet on a non-existent match: CS Mioveni - CS Universitatea Craiova.Now, have a look at the name & logo of CS Universitatea Craiova: https://i.ibb.co/8xn48Vv/rollbit2.pngThe real match of the team they make it look like: https://www.flashscore.de/spiel/jB4RhGfq/#/spiel-zusammenfassung/spiel-zusammenfassung (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oeW7Ajkqlos)The bet instead was on another team that name is: FC Universitatea 1948 (a second league team), with even different name & logo: https://www.facebook.com/fcucraiovaofficial/Giving people kinda a good quote on Barcelona - Ossasuna, and then you discover that Barcelona is Avency or any other team just by mistake. So stay aware before using they're sports bets area, the support is not useful at all they're just not assuming their own mistakes , be aware of this thieves!Scammers Profile Link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3067300Just did some searching, CS Mioveni - CS Universitatea Craiova took place in a Club Friendly Game on the date that is the same as your betslip:https://www.sofascore.com/ro/cs-mioveni-universitatea-craiova/GedsyzW which was a result of 1-1 [as shown on your betslip] meaning your bet lost. The bet you are saying was the bet you wanted to bet on ALSO took place on the 14th January, however as your betslip you didn't bet on that game [even if you intended to] you lost the bet.https://i.imgur.com/kbTZbAi.png Image shows the 2 games that took place on the same day.Your bet would have lost anyway even if you bet on the game you claim you believed it was.The fact that they put: CS Mioveni - CS Universitatea Craiova with good odds on over 2.5 which was the reason I've choosed it.I would never bet on CS Universitatea 1948, the fact is that Mioveni was presented to play with CS Universitatea Craiova not Universitatea 1948. They are different teams, with different logos. I just publish a scam way they use, they do mistakes in names, kinda Barcelona - Real Madrid, then they just say ah that was Barcelona II in a friendly game, do this make sense?

comments.author: John Abraham
comments.body: Quote from: eloniav2 on January 15, 2023, 04:00:56 PMThe fact that they put: CS Mioveni - CS Universitatea Craiova with good odds on over 2.5 which was the reason I've choosed it.I would never bet on CS Universitatea 1948, the fact is that Mioveni was presented to play with CS Universitatea Craiova not Universitatea 1948. They are different teams, with different logos. I just publish a scam way they use, they do mistakes in names, kinda Barcelona - Real Madrid, then they just say ah that was Barcelona II in a friendly game, do this make sense?Of course, it's their responsibility if they do mistake with Team names and Logos. But, There was a match between CS Mioveni - CS Universitatea.I searched on other websites as well and nowhere it says CS Universitatea 1948.So, How would you know which team it is? Simple, You have to check the team schedule and team players.I am wondering why a team will choose the same name. Are they the same club?

Simple, You have to check the team schedule and team players.I am wondering why a team will choose the same name. Are they the same club? Well no, aren't the same Club. They're different it ain't the same name I don't why those mistakes, the match that CS Mioveni had was with CS Universitatea 1948 not CS Universitatea Craiova, as I've contacted and asked. But yeah I just show that they can make u believe and giving good ods mistaking the names & logos and not assuming any responsability for that.EX: https://www.sofascore.com/fc-universitatea-craiova-1948-universitatea-craiova/yzWsIPzcThe one in left, is the one that they present that was playing with CS Mioveni, but the real fact is that they played with 1948. Another team, another name, another logo.

I assume you are one of the official members of The Rollbit team. The Rollbit maintained its reputation in the forum, and nice to see you here solving the issue.
